dashboard.title: Report on program integrity for each plan

props.label: D1.X.1 Dedicated program integrity staff
props.hint: Report or enter the number of dedicated program integrity staff for routine internal monitoring and compliance risks. Refer to 42 CFR 438.608(a)(1)(vii).

props.label: D1.X.2 Count of opened program integrity investigations
props.hint: How many program integrity investigations have been opened by the plan in the past year?

props.label: D1.X.3 Ratio of opened program integrity investigations to enrollees
props.hint: What is the ratio of program integrity investigations opened by the plan in the past year per 1,000 beneficiaries enrolled in the plan on the first day of the last month of the reporting year?

props.label: D1.X.4 Count of resolved program integrity investigations
props.hint: How many program integrity investigations have been resolved by the plan in the past year?

props.label: D1.X.5 Ratio of resolved program integrity investigations to enrollees
props.hint: What is the ratio of program integrity investigations resolved by the plan in the past year per 1,000 beneficiaries enrolled in the plan at the beginning of the reporting year?

props.label: D1.X.6 Referral path for program integrity referrals to the state
props.hint: What is the referral path that the plan uses to make program integrity referrals to the state? Select one.

choices.name: dpi-6-o1
choices.label: Makes referrals to the Medicaid Fraud Control Unit (MFCU) only

props.label: D1.X.7 Count of program integrity referrals to the state
props.hint: Enter the count of program integrity referrals that the plan made to the state in the past year. Enter the count of referrals made.

choices.name: dpi-6-o2
choices.label: Makes referrals to the State Medicaid Agency (SMA) and MFCU concurrently

props.label: D1.X.7 Count of program integrity referrals to the state
props.hint: Enter the count of program integrity referrals that the plan made to the state in the past year. Enter the count of unduplicated referrals

choices.name: dpi-6-o3
choices.label: Makes some referrals to the SMA and others directly to the MFCU

props.label: D1.X.7 Count of program integrity referrals to the state
props.hint: Enter the count of program integrity referrals that the plan made to the state in the past year. Enter the count of referrals made to the SMA and the MFCU in aggregate.

props.label: D1.X.8 Ratio of program integrity referrals to the state
props.hint: What is the ratio of program integrity referrals listed in the previous indicator made to the state in the past year per 1,000 beneficiaries, using the plan's total enrollment as of the first day of the last month of the reporting year (reported in indicator D1.I.2) as the denominator.

props.label: D1.X.9 Plan overpayment reporting to the state
